==Dialogue==
===Daytime===
{{Dialogue Start}}
:'''"Marigold":''' Shrawrr...
:'''Icayo:''' C'mon, what's got you so down? Something bad happen? Don't worry &mdash; if nothing else, you've got me.
:'''Icayo:''' I can't solve your problems, but I'll be by your side no matter what.
{{Dialogue End}}

===Nighttime===
{{Dialogue Start}}
:'''Icayo:''' Speaking of which, have you gotten a little chubby lately?
:'''"Ripple":''' Wroo?
:'''Icayo:''' *sigh* Nah, it's fine &mdash; in fact, you look pretty cute now. Want some more [[Sour Sauce Ceviche]]?
{{Dialogue End}}
